items.name: sage
items.description: A medicinal herb which can be used to craft a variety of items in combination with other herbs.

items.name: anthurium
items.description: A poisonous flower which can be used to craft a variety of items in combination with other herbs.

items.name: lavender
items.description: A purple flower which can be used to craft a variety of items in combination with other herbs.

items.name: coin
items.description: A type of currency that can be used to trade for various items.

items.name: oldSword
items.description: An old and worn-out sword which hasn't been used in years. Deals a mere 1 damage.

items.name: ironSword
items.description: A shiny iron sword in surprisingly good condition. Deals 3 damage.

items.name: woodenBow
items.description: A flimsy bow made from some wood. Fires arrows. Deals a mere 1 damage.

items.name: ironBow
items.description: A powerful and shiny bow that is well made. Fires arrows. Deals 3 damage.

items.name: healthPack
items.description: A handy health pack to make sure your health doesn't go too low. Heals 3 health.

items.name: chest
items.description: A placeable chest to store items in.

items.name: anthurium.2.sage.1.lavender.1
items.description: A recipe which requires 1 sage and 1 lavender. Crafts 2 anthurium.
